DataElement.preferredName: COVID-19 Vaccine Agreement Vaccine Participation Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Reason for agreeing to receive a COVID-19 Vaccine.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any vaccine that may prevent coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any vaccine that may prevent or treat coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Concepts.definition: Any vaccine that may prevent coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Property.preferredDefinition: 1. The act of agreeing. 2. Harmony of opinion; accord. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Preparations containing substances with antigenic properties administered to activate the immune system, thereby inducing an immune response._The act of taking part in an activity._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
